title: Beijing Equestrian Culture Week opens
content:
BEIJING, Sept. 19 (Xinhua) -- The Beijing International Equestrian Week opened in Equuleus Premium Club on Saturday.
A rider competes in the Equuleus Premium Open in Beijing. (Xinhua/Qin Lang)
Chinese rider Zhang Rui and his horse Hasigair in action. (Xinhua/Qin Lang)
A rider in action. (Xinhua/Qin Lang)
Equuleus Premium president Wang Qiang speaks to reporters. (Xinhua)
Equuleus Premium Open organizers meet reporters. (Xinhua)
